Very good teacher.
Best of all the classes I took on nccu. Also because he thought about the students' schedule by changing some data so we could be free on Christmas. Other courses did not do this.
Very kind and intelligent prof.
Honestly, one of the best courses I have received in NCCU. The professor teaches content that is relevant to the present and also practical projects that allow students to gain real life experience.

This course was one of the most interesting courses I ever had. I think it is fair to say, that he was the most motivated professor that I had this semester. He did several meetings to answers questions. I really learnt a lot!

超級推的一們課，能讓你對投資學、因子投資等有更深的認識。這門課有以下特色:

1. 教材與教學內容含金量 100%
雖然課程大綱的主要用書是老牌的 Bodie 投資學，但老師上課會引用近期的學術文獻，告訴我們現在大家在關注甚麼。

2. 用程式實際去感受投資理論
這門課有期末 project，老師上課也會講解如何檢測投資理論與因子投資，能提供你一個大致的架構去回測自己的投資想法。

老師英語流利，也很樂於回答問題 (回信超快!)，對因子投資有興趣的選就對了!
You are hands down one of the best professor I met in NCCU. The course combines the application and theory really well. Hat off to you sir.
課程內容很紮實，學習到很多理論與程式的結合，老師人也很好，雖然最後期末報告有點困難，但有組員討論，也能順利完成。謝謝老師!
